summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5733 for the improvement of 38th Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West Dravus Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75735 as amended by Ordinance No. 76762, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
